attributes.action: Investigate why the "free flow"system at northbound Dartford crossing has failed
attributes.additional_details: My travel time for 4 miles from Swanley has been 1hr 20 mins! That's outrageous. Dartford is gridlocked most nights since new system.
attributes.background: The crossing & area is now worse transit times and congestion is now horrendous every day, it's a constant and regular jam from tunnel back to j4 and surrounding areas of Dartford, Stone etc. It has not solved the problem but made it far worse daily. It's unparalled disaster for locals and commuters
